doc:
Earl Boen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Earl_Boen 0 Earl Boen (; born August 8, 1941) is an American actor and voice actor, perhaps best known as criminal psychologist Dr. Peter Silberman in The Terminator (1984), Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991) and Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines (2003). He is the only actor besides Arnold Schwarzenegger to appear in each of the first three Terminator films. Boen is also very active in the voice-over field. He is known for voicing characters such as Mr. Bleakman in Clifford the Big Red Dog, Police Chief Kanifky in Bonkers, the Narrator in World of Warcraft and Captain LeChuck in the Monkey Island series. Earl_Boen ( ; born August_8_,_1941 ) is an_American_actor_and_voice_actor , perhaps_best_known as criminal_psychologist_Dr._Peter_Silberman in The_Terminator ( 1984 ) , Terminator_2 : Judgment_Day ( 1991 ) and Terminator_3 : Rise of the_Machines ( 2003 ) . He is the_only_actor besides Arnold_Schwarzenegger to_appear in each of the_first_three_Terminator_films . Boen is also very_active in the_voice-over_field . He is_known for voicing_characters such_as Mr._Bleakman in Clifford the_Big_Red_Dog , Police_Chief_Kanifky in Bonkers , the_Narrator in World of Warcraft and Captain_LeChuck in the_Monkey_Island_series .
